AFAK Tanzania Ltd

Our Services

Logistics

With our extensive logistics network, we ensure that your goods are delivered to your customers in the most efficient and timely manner.

Construction Material Supply

We supply construction materials to construction sites across the country through our integrated logistics network on time.

Real Estate

Our real estate solutions give you the opportunity to own a property in a secure and secure environment.

Mining

Our mining operations are spearheaded by a team of highly qualified and experienced miners. We put in the effort to ensure that our clients are provided with the best possible service.

Software Solutions

Our innovative software solutions are designed to meet your business needs. We have a wide range of software solutions that are designed to meet your business needs.

Professional Business Consultancy

Our business development team is dedicated to providing you the best possible professional consultancy in the industry based on your project needs.
